title: following provisions of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 23
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 

2024 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (miscellaneous provisions) act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: following provisions of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 23
heading: 2. The 19th day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 19th day of August 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Health (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 23 
of 2024) shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1; 

(b) Part 2; 

(c) Part 6. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

6 August, 2024. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 16th August, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [406] 3
